page.title: 09INVERECK HOME.
page.content: Invereck Home is in the countryside. It is situated off the main road. When you go up to the home there is a long, wooded drive which leads to the main building. As you approach you will see a sandy coloured building which looks like a castle.In front of the home is a traffic island that you drive round. At the side of the home are 6 cottages. In front of the cottages there is a putting green and on each side of the home are two fields. There are sloping grassy areas with trees and flowers. The home is very attractive and in very pleasant, peaceful surroundings which make it an ideal place for old people.
